```{r}
cluster_plot <- function(data, method, clusters){
  scaled <- as.data.frame(t(scale(data)))
  distsFull <- dist(scaled, method="euclidean")
  
  hcl <- hclust(distsFull, method=method)
  plot(hcl)
  cut_avg <- cutree(hcl, k=clusters)
  
  return(rect.hclust(hcl, k=clusters, border = 2:6))
}
```

```{r}
cluster_plot(biSubset, "complete", 4)
```
